author: luna
description: Creates comics with random characters (+ 1300 new images) using a string of messages from a channel.
install_msg: Thanks for installing this cog! Please report any issues here: https://github.com/DJTOMATO/glas-cogs/issues. This cog comes with bundled data! Specifically, a library of images that are used as the actors in the generated comics. The character images are not bundled due to size constraints, and can be downloaded from https://lena.moe/characters.zip
name: weeedcog
